10.title: Editor & Publisher
10.author: Griffy
10.series: July 31, 1993) "Zippy, and his Head, Make a Point"
10.appears_in: reprinted on p. 34 of Editor & Publisher, v. 126, no. 31 (July 31, 1993).
notes: Summary: Zippy sees a crowd of people wearing cones on their heads, and thinks it's a tribute to him; Griffy says they're fans of the Coneheads movie and asks if he's going to file a lawsuit, but Zippy forgives them.
Title from caption applied by E&P.
